polito.sdp2017.Components

Class IP

  • java.lang.Object
    • polito.sdp2017.Components.IP
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IPCore, IPManager

    public class IP
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describes all possible features and functionalities that an IP, should have. One IP is characterized by an unique id, a name, a short description of the device, the hdl code (ABSOLUTE) path, a set of hardware properties, one contact point (an author) and an hardware interface.

    • Method Detail

      • getFromXML

        public static java.util.List<IP> getFromXML(java.lang.String xmlPath)
                                     throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                            javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                            java.io.IOException
        This method creates a list of object IPs, parsing an XML file containing their description. This file lists all the main properties, such as whether the object is a Cora or a Manager, the name, the id, the description, all data on the contact point, all the hardware properties.
        Parameters:
        xmlPath - The absolute path of the xml file
        Returns:
        the list of parsed IP. This list can contain both Cores and Manager at the same time.
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        java.io.IOException
